= Components =
(generated)


*Component items*:
  * *Speaker phonatory muscles* (phonatory-muscles): move vocal cords together and serve production of voice
   * *Speaker - lateral cricoarytenoid muscle* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_PSYM_ILG AVA.PN.PSYM.ILG] -> lateral-cricoarytenoid-muscle): adduct and medially rotate the cartilage, pulling the vocal ligaments towards the midline and backwards and so closing off the rima glottidis
   * *Speaker - arytenoid muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_AMB HMA.HM.AMB] -> arytenoid-muscle): approximate the arytenoid cartilages (close rima glottidis)
   * *Speaker - cricothyroid muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_AMB HMA.HM.AMB] -> cricothyroid-muscle): tension and elongation of the vocal folds (has minor adductory effect)
   * *Speaker - thyroarytenoid muscle* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_PSYM_ILG AVA.PN.PSYM.ILG] -> thyroarytenoid-muscle): thickens the vocal folds and decreases length; also helps to adduct the vocal folds during speech
   * *Speaker - oblique arytenoid muscle* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_PSYM_ILG AVA.PN.PSYM.ILG] -> oblique-arytenoid-muscle): sphincter of the laryngeal inlet
   * *Speaker - posterior cricoarytenoid muscle* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_PSYM_ILG AVA.PN.PSYM.ILG] -> posterior-cricoarytenoid-muscle): abducts and laterally rotates the cartilage, pulling the vocal ligaments away from the midline and forward and so opening the rima glottidis
   * *Speaker - thyroepiglottic muscle* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_PSYM_ILG AVA.PN.PSYM.ILG] -> thyroepiglottic-muscle): closes the inlet to the larynx
   * *Speaker - aryepiglottic muscle* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_PSYM_ILG AVA.PN.PSYM.ILG] -> aryepiglottic-muscle): close the inlet
  * *Speaker respiratory larynx muscles* (respiratory-muscles)
   * *Speaker - respiratory larynx muscles* (larynx-respiratory-muscles): move vocal cords apart and serve breathing
   * *Speaker - thyrohyoid muscle* ([BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_VM BMA.SC.VH.VM] -> larynx-thyrohyoid-muscle): depresses the hyoid and elevates the larynx
   * *Speaker - palatine tonsil receptors* (palatine-tonsil-receptors -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_JUG AVA.PN.SG.JUG]): visceral mucous membrane over soft palate and tonsil
   * *Speaker - omohyoid muscle* ([BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_VM BMA.SC.VH.VM] -> omohyoid-muscle): depresses the larynx and hyoid bone; carries hyoid bone backward and to the side
   * *Speaker - palatopharyngeus muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_AMB HMA.HM.AMB] -> palatopharyngeus-muscle): pulls pharynx and larynx
   * *Speaker - sternohyoid muscle* ([BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_VM BMA.SC.VH.VM] -> sternohyoid-muscle): depress hyoid bone
   * *Speaker - sternothyroid muscle* ([BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_VM BMA.SC.VH.VM] -> sternothyroid-muscle): elevates larynx, may slightly depress hyoid bone
   * *Speaker - levator muscle of thyroid gland* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_AMB HMA.HM.AMB] -> thyroid-gland-levator-muscle): elevates the thyroid gland
